ygData.subject: Re: Assist Command?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, the quickest way is to erase one of your socials buttons and redefine it as assist, then macro that button.  So you can just hit an F-key followed by
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 2 Jun 1999, jay schultze wrote:
>
> I found that the quickest way to /assist someone in your party was to use
> the F keys that are already setup for targetting party members. Actually i
> modified mine. The default config is F2 for the first party member in your
> list all the way down to F6 for the last. I changed this to F1 thru F5 for
> party members, just easier for me to remember. I hit the F key for whoever i
> want to assist and quickly type "/ASS" which is the short version of
> "/ASSIST" =)

Well, the quickest way is to erase one of your socials buttons
and redefine it as assist, then macro that button. So you can
just hit an F-key followed by a number key. :-)

F2 is always your party leader by the way, unless you're the
leader. Makes it easier to explain to other people - the
party leader picks a target, and everyone else hits F2 and
assists him.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
